attributes.action: stop those people who dont work from shopping on saturday when they have all week to do it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why do people who have all week free find it compulsory to block up supermarkets and other shopping areas on a Saturday, when it is the main day for the working people to do there shopping?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
